Question: This person won AFC Offensive Player of the Week for the 2nd time this season (18th time, career).
Hints: This person hosted Saturday Night Live with musical guest Carrie Underwood on March 24, 2007, his 31st birthday.
This person has been credited with helping to improve the image of the city of Indianapolis.
This person passed for a season-low 125 yards at Cleveland, but the Colts won their 5th straight game, by a final of 10–6.
